name: Basic Auditing Package
description: A comprehensive auditing package focused on key system checks and reports.

name: Advanced Auditing Package
description: Includes detailed analysis, risk assessment, and recommendations for system optimization.

name: Full Audit & Consultation Package
description: A full-service package that includes in-depth audits, consultation, and strategic improvement plans.

name: Basic AV Setup
description: Set up of basic audio and visual equipment, perfect for small spaces or personal use.

name: Premium AV Setup
description: An advanced audio and visual setup for larger venues or high-end installations.

name: Event AV Package
description: Complete AV solution for corporate events or large-scale gatherings, including live streaming.

name: Basic Conferencing Package
description: Basic video conferencing system setup for small teams or personal use.

name: Advanced Conferencing Package
description: A complete conferencing solution with high-quality video, audio, and collaborative tools.

name: Enterprise Conferencing Solution
description: Enterprise-grade conferencing systems with seamless integration across departments.

name: Basic Boardroom Package
description: A simple boardroom upgrade with essential conferencing tools and wireless connectivity.

name: Premium Boardroom Package
description: A comprehensive boardroom solution with interactive displays and high-quality AV systems.

name: Enterprise Boardroom Package
description: Top-of-the-line boardroom setup with automation, wireless presentation tools, and remote collaboration features.

name: Basic CCTV Package
description: Standard CCTV surveillance package with up to 4 cameras and basic recording options.

name: Advanced CCTV Package
description: Advanced CCTV setup with motion sensors, high-definition cameras, and remote access capabilities.

name: Full Security Package
description: Complete surveillance and security system with CCTV, alarms, and 24/7 monitoring.

name: Basic Networking Package
description: Set up a reliable and secure home or office network with routers and cabling.

name: Advanced Networking Package
description: Comprehensive networking solution with Wi-Fi optimization, firewalls, and business-grade routers.

name: Enterprise Networking Package
description: High-performance networking solution with advanced security, monitoring, and fiber-optic options.

name: Basic ICT Equipment Package
description: Essential ICT equipment package including computers, networking devices, and accessories.

name: Premium ICT Equipment Package
description: Comprehensive ICT equipment with advanced tech support and maintenance options.

name: Complete ICT Solutions
description: Full-service ICT solutions including hardware, software, maintenance, and installation.

name: Basic MSP Package
description: Essential managed IT services including basic infrastructure support and remote monitoring.

name: Advanced MSP Package
description: Advanced managed services with enhanced security, cloud solutions, and disaster recovery.

name: Enterprise MSP Package
description: Comprehensive managed IT services for large organizations, including 24/7 support and custom IT solutions.
